alert.note: Alert for Nowata; Osage; Washington (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 6:00AM CDT until June 14 at 6:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Osage County in northeastern Oklahoma... Washington County in northeastern Oklahoma... West central Nowata County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 645 AM CDT. * At 559 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Hulah to 2 miles north of Wynona to near Fairfax, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Bartlesville... Pawhuska... Hominy... Dewey... Fairfax... Barnsdall... Copan... Ramona... Wynona... Ochelata... Avant... Bartlesville Municipal Airport... Hulah... Sunset Lake... Osage Hills State Park... Okesa... Wah Sha She State Park... Tallant... Pershing... Nelagoney... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
